words.tran_cn: 不满的；有叛意的；愤愤不平的
使疏远；使不友爱（disaffect的过去分词）
使疏远；使不满意；使成为敌人

trans.tran_en: Disaffection is the attitude that people have when they stop supporting something such as an organization or political ideal
